Package com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.builder

Android routine builder definitions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextChannelBuilder
    Interface defining a builder of output channels bound to routine invocations.
    In order to be successfully bound, the specific routine invocation must have a user defined ID and still running (or cached) at the time of the channel creation.
    ContextConfigurableBuilder<TYPE>
    Interface defining a configurable builder of context routines.
    ContextObjectRoutineBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of routine objects based on methods of a concrete object instance.
    ContextRoutineBuilder<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Interface defining a builder of routines bound to a context lifecycle.
    FactoryContext
    Interface defining a factory providing wrapped object instances, whose methods are to be called inside asynchronous invocations.
    InvocationConfiguration.Configurable<TYPE>
    Interface defining a configurable object.
    ServiceConfigurableBuilder<TYPE>
    Interface defining a configurable builder of service routines.
    ServiceConfiguration.Configurable<TYPE>
    Interface defining a configurable object.
    ServiceObjectRoutineBuilder
    Class implementing a builder of routine objects based on methods of a concrete object instance.
    ServiceRoutineBuilder<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Interface defining a builder of routine objects based on an invocation class token.
    The invocation execution will happen in a dedicated service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InvocationConfiguration
    Class storing the context invocation configuration.
    InvocationConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
    Builder of invocation configurations.
    ServiceConfiguration
    Class storing the service configuration.
    ServiceConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
    Builder of service configurations.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InvocationConfiguration.CacheStrategyType
    Result cache type enumeration.
    The cache strategy type indicates what will happen to the result of an invocation after its completion.
    InvocationConfiguration.ClashResolutionType
    Invocation clash resolution enumeration.
    The clash of two invocation happens when the same ID is already in use at the time of the routine execution.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InputClashException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations with the same ID but different input data.
    InvocationClashException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations with the same ID.
    InvocationMissingException
    Exception indicating that a routine invocation with a specified ID is not running.

Package com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.builder Description

Android routine builder definitions.
